p: Aspartame is an artificial sweetener that has 180 and 200 times more sweetener power than sucrose. Because of this, it is the most used sweetener in the pharmaceutical and food industry. It is a disaccharide made of an aspartic acid and a methyl phenylalanine ester. It is an excipient of mandatory declaration and its maximum dose has been set at 40 mg/kg body weight [ 29, 35].
